sqlMap.sql: JD_RESULT_ID, ENTRUST_ID, ENTRUST_CODE, NAME, PROCESS_INST_ID, REMARK, STATUS, INPUTOR, INPUT_DATE, JD_DATE, JD_ADDRESS, ZC_PERSONS, BRIEF, JD_PROCESS, JD_RESULT, JD_OPINION, RESULT_TYPE, FILE_ID, ND,JDR
sqlMap.select:
select
from SF_JD_RESULT where 1=1
ENTRUST_ID=#dattr1#
ENTRUST_ID=#dattr5#
SF_JD_RESULT.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_JD_RESULT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor=#executor# and instance_id = SF_JD_RESULT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = SF_JD_RESULT.process_inst_id) and SF_JD_RESULT.STATUS!= 'cancel' and SF_JD_RESULT.STATUS != 'exec'
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=SF_JD_RESULT.process_inst_id) or SF_JD_RESULT.process_inst_id = -1 ) and SF_JD_RESULT.STATUS ='0'
(SF_JD_RESULT.STATUS='exec')
1=1
order by SF_JD_RESULT.JD_RESULT_ID desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into SF_JD_RESULT (JD_RESULT_ID, ENTRUST_ID, ENTRUST_CODE, NAME, PROCESS_INST_ID, REMARK, STATUS, INPUTOR, INPUT_DATE, JD_DATE, JD_ADDRESS, ZC_PERSONS, BRIEF, JD_PROCESS, JD_RESULT, JD_OPINION, RESULT_TYPE, FILE_ID, ND,JDR) values (#jdResultId:DECIMAL#, #entrustId:DECIMAL#, #entrustCode:VARCHAR#, #name:VARCHAR#, #processInstId:DECIMAL#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #inputor:VARCHAR#, #inputDate:DATE#, #jdDate:DATE#, #jdAddress:VARCHAR#, #zcPersons:VARCHAR#, #brief:VARCHAR#, #jdProcess:VARCHAR#, #jdResult:VARCHAR#, #jdOpinion:VARCHAR#, #resultType:VARCHAR#, #fileId:VARCHAR#, #nd:DECIMAL#,#jdr#)
sqlMap.update: update SF_JD_RESULT set ENTRUST_ID = #entrustId:DECIMAL#, ENTRUST_CODE = #entrustCode:VARCHAR#, NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:DECIMAL#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#, INPUTOR = #inputor:VARCHAR#, INPUT_DATE = #inputDate:DATE#, JD_DATE = #jdDate:DATE#, JD_ADDRESS = #jdAddress:VARCHAR#, ZC_PERSONS = #zcPersons:VARCHAR#, BRIEF = #brief:VARCHAR#, JD_PROCESS = #jdProcess:VARCHAR#, JD_RESULT = #jdResult:VARCHAR#, JD_OPINION = #jdOpinion:VARCHAR#, RESULT_TYPE = #resultType:VARCHAR#, FILE_ID = #fileId:VARCHAR#, ND = #nd:DECIMAL#, JDR=#jdr# where JD_RESULT_ID = #jdResultId:DECIMAL#
